title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 97.3 - Field inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 97.3 - Field inspection

State Regulations
(a) An
inspector of the certifying agency shall make at least one field inspection of
each field entered for certification. (b) Field inspection shall be made after the
crop is fully headed when varietal or crop mixtures can be
determined. (c) The inspector shall
cross the field sufficiently to evaluate accurately the factors affecting the
eligibility for certification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
97.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
